About/Projects

Info about me and stuff I've done over the year(s).'

I am a Computer Science student at the City College of New York and a game developer at UGF Studio. Below are projects I've worked on as a student and as a game developer. Additionally, links will be provided to each project's respective pages.

Games

Debugit/Debugit: The Spinoff

The Debugit series is a collection of two 3D space shooters. The games were built using Unity3D and built for Windows Phone and Android. Below are links to both games for all versions!
Debugit |Windows Phone|
Debugit: The Spinoff |Windows Phone|
Debugit: The Spinoff |Android|
